channel.title: Comments on: Going around (some of) the world

item.title: By: Yanice Figueredo
item.dc:creator: Yanice Figueredo
item.description: It´s my dream to travel around the world i really admire you! You should come to Paraguay
item.content:encoded: It´s my dream to travel around the world i really admire you! You should come to Paraguay

item.title: By: Sarah Duff
item.dc:creator: Sarah Duff
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/going-around-world/#comment-14664">John Weatherson</a>.
Thanks John!

item.title: By: John Weatherson
item.dc:creator: John Weatherson
item.description:
Make sure to visit the underground Churches in Colombia.....so many steps!!...hundreds!!
Cucuta in Colombia is interesting. I used to watch bull fights there in the 1970's and during sangria
The llanos in Venezuela which used to be one of the biggest beef exporters in the world....now importing.
Venezuelan music from the llanos is an aphrodisiac...harp ,quarto and maracas....they sing the quatra punto!
Maybe my cowboy friends are long dead....but you never know!
Eat arepas!! (like a hamburger made from maize meal instead of bread...knockout!!
Have a ball ! !
item.content:encoded:
Make sure to visit the underground Churches in Colombia…..so many steps!!…hundreds!!

Cucuta in Colombia is interesting. I used to watch bull fights there in the 1970’s and during sangria

The llanos in Venezuela which used to be one of the biggest beef exporters in the world….now importing.

Venezuelan music from the llanos is an aphrodisiac…harp ,quarto and maracas….they sing the quatra punto!

Maybe my cowboy friends are long dead….but you never know!

Eat arepas!! (like a hamburger made from maize meal instead of bread…knockout!!

Have a ball ! !

item.title: By: Monica
item.dc:creator: Monica
item.description: How exciting! I hope you have an incredible time. I'd love to go to South and central America so I look forward to seeing how you get on.
item.content:encoded: How exciting! I hope you have an incredible time. I’d love to go to South and central America so I look forward to seeing how you get on.
